撜字的基本解释

撜
zhěng
古同“拯”，拯救。

撜
chéng
接触：“岂比俎豆古，不为手所撜。”

撜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhěng］
［《廣韻》蒸上切，上拯，章。］
同“拯1”。
救援。参见“撜溺”。
[②]［chéng］
［《集韻》除庚切，平庚，澄。］
同“掁1”。
接触。

撜字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　撜； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页454第25
【唐韻】【集韻】?蒸上聲。【說文】抍或从登。【淮南子·齊俗訓】子路撜溺而受牛謝。別作拯。　又【集韻】常證切。又書蒸切，?詳抍字註。　又除庚切，音棖。與棖同。【韓愈·石鼎聮句】全勝瑚璉貴，空有口傳名。豈此俎豆古，不爲手所撜。

撜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
撜字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhěng］
["Guang Yun" steamed on the cut, Shang Zheng, chapter. ]
Same as "Zheng 1".
Rescue. See "Drowning".
[②]［chéng］
["Ji Yun" except Gengqie, Ping Geng, Cheng. ]
Same as "掁1".
contact.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Jihui] [Hand Character Department] 　撜; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 454 25
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Steamed on the sound. [Speaking text] 抍 or Congdeng. [Huainanzi·Qi Suxun] Zilu was drowned and thanked by cattle. Don't be a life saver.　[Jiyun] often proves to be cut. The book is steamed and cut again, with a detailed note.　In addition to Gengqie, Yinxi. Same as 枨. [Han Yu·Shi Ding's Sentence] Quan Sheng Hulian is expensive, and there is no oral name. It's so old, not to be slapped by hands.
